roleset.name: hug, embrace
roleset.note: HUG-V NOTES: Somehow I'm not surprised that this doesn't occur frequently in WSJ. (from hug.01-v)

example.name: only metaphorical, sadly
example.text: Dealers said institutions were still largely hugging the sidelines on fears that the market's recent technical rally might prove fragile.
example.arg: on fears that the market's recent technical rally might prove fragile
